refnamediv.refpurpose: Check if strings are valid for the specified encoding

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
value
The byte stream or &array; to check. If it is omitted, this function checks all the input from the beginning of the request.
As of PHP 8.1.0, omitting this parameter or passing NULL is deprecated and emits an E_DEPRECATED warning.
encoding
The expected encoding.
